alert.note: Alert for Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 11:46AM EST until January 11 at 2:20AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of piedmont North Carolina, including the following county, Rowan. * WHEN...Until 400 PM EST. * IMPACTS...River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1142 AM EST, Still remain wary of flooding of low-lying areas this afternoon as rivers in the reach have been very slow to recede. Yadkin River tributaries which continue to see high water conditions include, but are not limited to Second, Third, Fourth, and Grants Creeks. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
